pages.text: $(#630000)The Blood Lotus is one of my favorite parasitic analogues of a flower. It is used to craft a $(l:items/guandao)Guandao$()$(#630000), and serves as the source of the Incense billowing out of the weapon.

$(#630000)I can give any small flower to a Factory to get one. Additionally, I can plant them on any viable soil, parasitic or otherwise. Normally, a lotus is meant to grow in the water, but I like the look better when it grows on soil instead.
$(#630000)Unlike other parasites, however, it does replicate itself when given Bone Meal. It's almost like a real plant, if a real plant was filled with "spores"
